title: How to play Gnar???

replies.body: thats true. as soon as she stunned me i was as good as gone lol. i cant cs very well with a hands on champ such as darius or say renekton. any advice for them?

Play safe till after Lvl6, by then you should have a balance of health and AD items, only then can you fight them head on. You can ask for ganks/camps but otherwise playing safe is key. Two things I don't like about Gnar though are, he's awkward to use, especially his Rage mechanic since it's so unreliable, including his R which is fine on its own but it's full potential is when you're near a wall. The other thing is, is that your W passive, Hyper decays really fast, faster than other 'marked' damage passives. People like Kennen, Varus, Vayne etc have that 3 proc things, whereas Gnar's decays faster than you expect, I would have 2 stacks and by the time I get through the minion wave's unit collision to fire off a Q or something it would've disappeared.

IDK man, I only bought Gnar due to free skin via hextech crafting, and I went just as miserable as you.
He seems a difficult/awkward champ. I think it's just one of those "requires practice" things, not like a champ such as xerath, which you can free week play for first time, and go 20/5.
